recipesJson.name: Vanilla Flavored Cupcake With Berries Jam

recipesJson.description:
Vanilla Flavored Cupcake With Berries Jam.
It is good right after you mix it.
gets more cakey after 15 days
Enjoy!

reviews.text: this one must be the best blueberry recipe i have vaped.well mixed,well balanced,no off notes,delicious!
